name: PigSty (Craggle Rock Games)
description:
PigSty is a game where you move your little pig around and draw stuff with his poop.

That's it really...

More content will be added over time as I figure out what the hell you could add to a game like this.

Feedback appreciated!

Controls:

WASD - Move

Left Mouse - Draw

R - Restart

ESC - Quit
